page.title: 07A NESTON CHILD'S DAY
page.content:
{ { {A Day In The Life Of Jenny Sanderson
Wednesday I wake up when my alarm goes off at 7.30am and I lie in bed for about 2 minutes until I wake up properly. Then I go downstairs and get dressed, I have my breakfast and then get washed.With the few minutes I have left I play with my brother,who is two years old,while mum washes the dishes. Then we all wave to dad going to work. Then it is time for choir so I set off with my sister,wave to everyone and walk down to school.At choir we sing our songs for the concert.I set up our stand and after assembly we go into our classes. We have Maths before play and P.E. and English after play.
